articles.author: William Bibbiani
articles.title: The Most Controversial Horror Movies Ever
articles.description: The horror genre has produced many of the most violent and subversive movies in history. Here are the films that were protested, banned, or worse.

articles.author: Colin Stevens
articles.title: $900 Resident Evil 2 Remake Japanese Special Edition Includes a Bluetooth Typewriter Keyboard
articles.description: The upcoming Resident Evil 2 remake is receiving an official Lexington typewriter USB keyboard with the Japanese Premium Edition of the game, and it will only set you back about $900 US.
